page.title: 05QUARRYING
page.content: In our D.Block there are lots of disused quarries but today there is only one working and that is {Trevassack quarry.} The stone which was quarryied in the disued quarries was used for making hedges ,farm buildings,and for building stone houses. The quarry is about one hundred years old and produces{serpentine}and blue } elvan.Today's products are used mainly for{road building}but some stone is used for{sculpturing .} The process is to drill deep holes into the stone and using dynamite, blast large quantities of stone ready for crushing to the right size and selling to local companies. Quarring is eating into the surrounding{heathland}and destroying {rare plants}and{flowers.}
